headline: Marsh McLennan Appoints Bruce Broussard to its Board of Directors
summary: NEW YORK, July 09, 2025--The Board of Directors of Marsh McLennan (NYSE: MMC), a global leader in risk, strategy and people, today appointed Bruce Broussard as a director, effective immediately. The Company’s Board now consists of 12 directors.

headline: Marsh McLennan Increases Quarterly Cash Dividend
summary: NEW YORK, July 09, 2025--The Board of Directors of Marsh McLennan (NYSE: MMC) today declared a 10% increase in the quarterly dividend from $0.815 to $0.900 per share on outstanding common stock, payable on August 15, 2025, to stockholders of record on July 24, 2025.

summary: By Colin Kellaher Marsh & McLennan's board has raised the professional-services company's quarterly dividend by 10%, to 90 cents from 81.5 cents. The new payout, equal to $3.60 a year,...
